name: Cute RPG Harbor 16x16 retro tileset asset pack!
name_original: Cute RPG Harbor 16x16 retro tileset asset pack!
description:
Cute RPG World is an asset pack that focus on a cute pixel art with bright colors that will make anyone want to play your game! Features
  • Over 500 tiles!
  • Fishing overlay for characters!
  • Animated tiles included!
  • Animated chest!
  • Animated water objects!
  • 3 sizes 16x16, 32x32 and 48x48 tiles!
  • RPG Maker Tilesets included!
  • .PNG sprite sheet file!
Cute RPG World content:
  • 4.000+ cute tiles!
  • 100+ character sprites!
  • 50+ enemies sprites!
  • 140+ Item Icons!
  • Animated water tiles!
  • Animated flower and other tiles!
  • 3 sizes 16x16, 32x32 and 48x48 tiles!
  • 3 sizes 24x24, 48x48 and 72x72 sprites!
  • RPG Maker files included!
  • .PNG sprite sheet file!
License

You can:

  • You can use it on your project, personal or commercial.
  • You can modify and edit it to fit your project.
  • Credits to PixyMoon.

You cannot:

  • Sell this asset pack, not even modified.
  • Claim this asset as yours.

Don't forget to rate the asset and follow me!♥
You can also get updates on what I'm doing on twitter!
